Summary: Three lights traveling north south of Ball Ground.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Ball Ground
There were no other sightings in Ball Ground on or around January 9th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsPicked up my son being dropped off at a nearby subdivision (The Preserve) then we were at the stop sign at our street, when my son notice the lights. I then looked up and saw them myself. Instead of turning onto our street, we went straight thru the stop sign and around our subdivision and by the post office, the area was at a higher elevation so we could seen the enire surrounding location. The lights were gone. We then headed to the local gas station while looking up into the sky. My son wanted a drink, so we stopped into the gas station. At the counter was one of his friends from school, who then said to my son, I just saw a UFO, he was coming into town from Nelson, GA which is opposite from where were. When we first saw the lights, they looked like they were traveling the speed of a small airplane, they couldn't have disappeared that fast.
